data.name: Byte Lynx
data.detailed_description:
Byte Lynx is a single-player sci-fi real-time strategy game with innovative construction-based combat. Your objective is to explore an ancient world in the X-736 solar system flagged as "dangerous" and hidden by the First Ones. This newly discovered planet sits at the foot of the galactic alliance and requires immediate investigation. This planet cannot be observed directly and requires on-site attention. As commander of this expedition, you will explore this planet and determine how it evades our scanners.

Conquer your enemies

Charge onward into battle, defeating those who oppose your conquest. Watch your flanks and maintain a stable offensive.

Acquire resources

Ancient nanites and energy systems permeate the X-736 solar system. Build and re-shape your network to collect and exploit these resources.

Build your base

Build a sprawling base that extends to dominate the local resources and flank your enemies. Prioritize building tight defenses or expose yourself for greater gain.

Command the battle

Create unbeatable fortifications to push into enemy lines. Control your constructions to outmaneuver the enemy defenses.

Gameplay Features

  • 20 Mission Campaign
  • 3 Difficulty levels
  • 8 Versatile constructions
  • ∞ Assault platform configurations
  • AI-voiced narrative

About the developers

Artful Games is a two-person studio aiming to create innovative gameplay experiences. Byte Lynx, our first title, features unique construction-based combat. Byte Lynx is a spiritual successor to a DigiPen student game.

data.short_description: Byte Lynx is a sci-fi real-time strategy game with construction-based combat set in the X-736 solar system. Out-maneuver your opponent and make their base your own. Build powerful assault platforms to lay waste to fortified defenses.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: 4 Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 TI or higher
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
